1001.short_description: MCP failure, may be caused by HaxchiFW
1001.long_description:
***Note:*** This error relates to the Martini patches, which are now deprecated.

The console's CFW is not compatible with Pretendo's patcher.
1001.long_solution:
If you are using Haxchi, Coldboot Haxchi, Indexiine, Browserhax or similar, please [upgrade to Tiramisu or Aroma](https://wiiu.hacks.guide) and try again.

If you're sure you're using Tiramisu or Aroma, reboot the console and try again. If the same error occurs, get in touch with a developer in our [Discord](https://invite.gg/pretendo).
